sources.title: A Coach for Cinderella (1937)
sources.description: The typical Cinderella storyline: wicked stepmother and stepsisters, and Cinderella can't go to the ball. We see elves and woodland creatures making a dress and a coach out of various woodland materials. A twist: the coach they make then goes though a "modernizer" and comes out as a 1946 Chevy. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/a-coach-for-cinderella-1937/

metadata.Plot: The typical Cinderella storyline: wicked stepmother and stepsisters, and Cinderella can't go to the ball. metadata.Director: F. Lyle Goldman, Francis Lyle Goldman
